dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') loc_name, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','3')) loc_address, TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER')) loc_city_state_zip, (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'KS' THEN 'Phone: 877-905-8525' WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'IL' THEN 'Phone: 630-874-2918' ELSE '' END) loc_phone, (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'KS' THEN 'Fax: 913-696-9240' WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'IL' THEN 'Fax: 630-493-1402' ELSE '' END) loc_fax, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'fmMM/DD/YYYY') system_date, j.job_xid bill_lading, loc1.location_name agent_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(s.servprov_gid) agent_address, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(s.servprov_gid) agent_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_phone_with_label(s.servprov_gid,'PHONE:') agent_phone, s.attribute1 booking_number, loc1.location_name carrier_name, REPLACE(srem1.remark_text,'|',CHR(13)) load_references, loc2.location_name pickup_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(s.container_pickup_loc_gid) pickup_address, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(s.container_pickup_loc_gid) pickup_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_phone_with_label(s.container_pickup_loc_gid,'TEL:') pickup_phone, TRIM(TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.start_time,s.source_location_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY') || ' ' || sref1.shipment_refnum_value) pickup_date, loc3.location_name deliver_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(s.source_location_gid) deliver_address, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(s.source_location_gid) deliver_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_phone_with_label(s.source_location_gid,'TEL:') deliver_phone, TRIM(TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.end_time, s.dest_location_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY') || ' ' || sref2.shipment_refnum_value) deliver_date, loc4.location_name return_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(s.dest_location_gid) return_address, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(s.dest_location_gid) return_city_state_zip, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_phone_with_label(s.dest_location_gid,'TEL:') return_phone, REPLACE(srem2.remark_text,'|',CHR(13)) special_load_instructions, s.attribute2 pickup_num, (CASE WHEN NOT (SELECT ssu.tag_3 FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) IS NULL THEN (SELECT ssu.tag_3 FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) ELSE s.attribute5 END) equipment_num, (SELECT eg.equipment_group_xid FROM equipment_group eg INNER JOIN s_equipment seq ON eg.equipment_group_gid = seq.equipment_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON seq.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1) equipment_type, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.commodity_cases_dom(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVODOM.COMMODITY DESCRIPTION','SCOULAR.COMMODITY') descript_of_cargo, TRIM(TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'LB' THEN s.total_net_weight * 0.453592 WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'KG' THEN s.total_net_weight WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'TON' THEN (s.total_net_weight * 2000) * 0.453592 WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'MTON' OR s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'MT' THEN s.total_net_weight * 1000 ELSE s.total_net_weight END),'999,999,990.00')) total_weight_kgs, TRIM(TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'LB' THEN s.total_net_weight WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'KG' THEN s.total_net_weight * 2.20462262 WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'TON' THEN s.total_net_weight * 2000 WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'MTON' OR s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'MT' THEN s.total_net_weight * 2204.62442018 ELSE s.total_net_weight END),'999,999,990.00')) total_weight_lbs, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fullname(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') ops_name, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','Tel:') ops_phone, glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_email_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','Email:') ops_email FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.PICKUPTIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.DELIVERYTIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem1 ON s.shipment_gid = srem1.shipment_gid AND srem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.LOAD REFERENCES' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem2 ON s.shipment_gid = srem2.shipment_gid AND srem2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.WORK ORDER SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.servprov_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.container_pickup_loc_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON s.source_location_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc4 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc4.location_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND :P_RUN = 'FINAL' UNION SELECT NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_location_name(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') loc_name, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','1') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','2') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_address(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','3')), 'Data Missing in System') loc_address, NVL(TRIM(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_city(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER',',') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_zip(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') || ' ' || glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_country(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER')), 'Data Missing in System') loc_city_state_zip, (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'KS' THEN 'Phone: 877-905-8525' WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'IL' THEN 'Phone: 630-874-2918' ELSE '' END) loc_phone, (CASE WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'KS' THEN 'Fax: 913-696-9240' WHEN glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_province(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER') = 'IL' THEN 'Fax: 630-493-1402' ELSE '' END) loc_fax, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'fmMM/DD/YYYY') system_date, NVL(j.job_xid, 'Data Missing in System') bill_lading, NVL(loc1.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') agent_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(s.servprov_gid), 'Data Missing in System') agent_address, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(s.servprov_gid), 'Data Missing in System') agent_city_state_zip, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_phone_with_label(s.servprov_gid,'PHONE:'), 'Data Missing in System') agent_phone, NVL(s.attribute1, 'Data Missing in System') booking_number, NVL(loc1.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') carrier_name, NVL(REPLACE(srem1.remark_text,'|',CHR(13)), 'Data Missing in System') load_references, NVL(loc2.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') pickup_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(s.container_pickup_loc_gid), 'Data Missing in System') pickup_address, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(s.container_pickup_loc_gid), 'Data Missing in System') pickup_city_state_zip, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_phone_with_label(s.container_pickup_loc_gid,'PHONE:'), 'Data Missing in System') pickup_phone, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.start_time,s.source_location_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY') || ' ' || sref1.shipment_refnum_value), 'Data Missing in System') pickup_date, NVL(loc3.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') deliver_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(s.source_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') deliver_address, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(s.source_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') deliver_city_state_zip, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_phone_with_label(s.source_location_gid,'PHONE:'), 'Data Missing in System') deliver_phone, NVL(TRIM(TO_CHAR(glogowner.utc.get_local_date(s.end_time, s.dest_location_gid),'MM/DD/YYYY') || ' ' || sref2.shipment_refnum_value), 'Data Missing in System') deliver_date, NVL(loc4.location_name, 'Data Missing in System') return_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_address(s.dest_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') return_address, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.loc_city_state_zip(s.dest_location_gid), 'Data Missing in System') return_city_state_zip, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.contact_phone_with_label(s.dest_location_gid,'PHONE:'), 'Data Missing in System') return_phone, NVL(REPLACE(srem2.remark_text,'|',CHR(13)), 'Data Missing in System') special_load_instructions, NVL(s.attribute2, 'Data Missing in System') pickup_num, NVL((CASE WHEN NOT (SELECT ssu.tag_3 FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) IS NULL THEN (SELECT ssu.tag_3 FROM shipment_stop_d ssd INNER JOIN s_ship_unit ssu ON ssd.s_ship_unit_gid = ssu.s_ship_unit_gid WHERE ssd.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND stop_num = 1 AND ROWNUM = 1) ELSE s.attribute5 END), 'Data Missing in System') equipment_num, NVL((SELECT eg.equipment_group_xid FROM equipment_group eg INNER JOIN s_equipment seq ON eg.equipment_group_gid = seq.equipment_group_gid INNER JOIN shipment_s_equipment_join ssej ON seq.s_equipment_gid = ssej.s_equipment_gid WHERE ssej.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND ROWNUM = 1), 'Data Missing in System') equipment_type, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.commodity_cases_dom(s.shipment_gid,'SCOULAR/NVODOM.COMMODITY DESCRIPTION','SCOULAR.COMMODITY'), 'Data Missing in System') descript_of_cargo, NVL(TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'LB' THEN s.total_net_weight * 0.453592 WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'KG' THEN s.total_net_weight WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'TON' THEN (s.total_net_weight * 2000) * 0.453592 WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'MTON' OR s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'MT' THEN s.total_net_weight * 1000 ELSE s.total_net_weight END),'999,999,990.00'), 'Data Missing in System') total_weight_kgs, NVL(TO_CHAR((CASE WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'LB' THEN s.total_net_weight WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'KG' THEN s.total_net_weight * 2.20462262 WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'TON' THEN s.total_net_weight * 2000 WHEN s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'MTON' OR s.total_net_weight_uom_code = 'MT' THEN s.total_net_weight * 2204.62442018 ELSE s.total_net_weight END),'999,999,990.00'), 'Data Missing in System') total_weight_lbs, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_fullname(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER'), 'Data Missing in System') ops_name, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_phone_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','Tel:'), 'Data Missing in System') ops_phone, NVL(glogowner.xxscou_nvo_report_functions.entity_email_with_label(s.shipment_gid,'XXX','SCOULAR/NVODOM.OPS MANAGER','Email:'), 'Data Missing in System') ops_email FROM job j LEFT OUTER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'B') LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref1 ON s.shipment_gid = sref1.shipment_gid AND sref1.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.PICKUPTIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_refnum sref2 ON s.shipment_gid = sref2.shipment_gid AND sref2.shipment_refnum_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.DELIVERYTIME' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem1 ON s.shipment_gid = srem1.shipment_gid AND srem1.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.LOAD REFERENCES' LEFT OUTER JOIN shipment_remark srem2 ON s.shipment_gid = srem2.shipment_gid AND srem2.remark_qual_gid = 'SCOULAR/NVODOM.WORK ORDER SPECIAL INSTRUCTIONS' LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc1 ON s.servprov_gid = loc1.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc2 ON s.container_pickup_loc_gid = loc2.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc3 ON s.source_location_gid = loc3.location_gid LEFT OUTER JOIN location loc4 ON s.dest_location_gid = loc4.location_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID AND :P_RUN = 'DRAFT'

SELECT TRIM(a.rates) rates, a.base FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sc.shipment_cost_seqno, (CASE WHEN sc.cost_type = 'A' THEN (SELECT ac.accessorial_code_xid FROM accessorial_code ac WHERE ac.accessorial_code_gid = sc.accessorial_code_gid) ELSE ' LINE HAUL' END) rates, '$' || TRIM(TO_CHAR(sc.cost, '999,999,990.00')) base FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'B') INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON sc.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID ORDER BY rates) a

SELECT TRIM(TO_CHAR(SUM(a.total_cost), '$999,999,990.00')) total_amount FROM (SELECT DISTINCT sc.shipment_cost_seqno, sc.cost total_cost FROM job j INNER JOIN job_order_release_join jorj ON j.job_gid = jorj.job_gid INNER JOIN view_shipment_order_release vsor ON jorj.order_release_gid = vsor.order_release_gid AND vsor.shipment_gid IN ( SELECT sh.shipment_gid FROM shipment sh WHERE vsor.shipment_gid = sh.shipment_gid AND sh.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND sh.is_primary = 'Y' AND sh.perspective = 'B') INNER JOIN shipment s ON vsor.shipment_gid = s.shipment_gid AND s.shipment_type_gid = 'TRANSPORT' AND s.is_primary = 'Y' AND s.perspective = 'B' INNER JOIN shipment_cost sc ON s.shipment_gid = sc.shipment_gid WHERE j.job_gid = :JOB_ID) a
